thread.subject: 10/1-5/3/2014 - Exclusive Offer on Tools! EXTRA $15 off any Tool priced $75 or more with code SAVE15 (exclusions apply)
thread.content:
Sears has One item in cart must have minimum $75 value to receive full discount. Coupon code must be entered in cart to see discount. Limit 1 coupon per order. Coupon may only be used once and cannot be combined with any other coupons. Items Sold by Sears. No Sears store price matching is permitted on this offer. Discount applies in cart with Coupon Code SAVE15. Offer valid through 5/3/2014. Excludes Great Price, Hot Buys and Clearance Items. Also excludes Garage Door Openers, Portable Power Tools, Bench Power Tools, excludes item numbers 00910269000P,00959093000P, and 00959035000P. Internationally Shipped Orders are excluded
